review_text: Next generation pressure cooker, has a button to tell you if it is pressurized, it pops up, when it goes down, it is safe to open, meat falls apart in as little as 15 min for chicken 20 mins for pork and beef, i guess 15 lbs pressure is the setting, doesn't say, but much faster than my older mirro cooker.
product_name: Mirro 92180A Polished Aluminum 10-PSI Pressure Cooker Cookware, 8-Quart, Silver
